about_the_game:
Sweet Surrender is a fast-paced Roguelike VR shooter, set in a dystopian megatower that forces you to adapt to its ruthless, action-packed warzone.

Destroy a sea of enemies throughout procedurally generated levels. Build your arsenal of weapons, explosives, and upgrade chips to defeat our mechanical overlords. They won’t just sit there and take it, so make every moment count!

You are alone, outnumbered but not outclassed. With humanity on the verge of extinction, will you heed the call and fight your way to the summit?

Modern Arcade Roguelite meets Virtual Reality




  • Agile Combat - Run through levels and across enemy territory to gun down the opposition. Also includes snap-turning, smooth-turning, teleporting, and various comfort options. Discover the Grapplegun to reach previously hidden areas or zipline across lava; Move how you want!



  • Gunplay and Weapon Variety - Pick from a wide selection of weapons to get the job done. You name it—we got it. Pistols, shotguns, rifles, machine guns, snipers, explosive launchers, and melee weapons galore!



  • Upgrades and Enhancements - Gather upgrade chips and become a ruthless war machine! Customize your build and turn the tides of battle with world-shattering enhancements. Blast EMPs on hit, slow down time, and even siphon energy from the fiendish automatons!



  • Learn and Adapt - Face a fresh challenge with each playthrough! Unlock shortcuts, discover hidden levels, and find new ways to devastate the robotic command—the world is your battlefield!



  • Unlockables and Progression - Open the door to more gameplay as you tear through robot hordes! Unlock new classes and their upgrades, including the Medic, Grenadier, Sniper, and Reaper. Discover your optimal playstyle/loadout, or challenge yourself with our hellish Lunatic Mode!

Roadmap




Interested in what we’re planning for future updates? Check out our public roadmap to be up to date on past and future updates. We’ve been updating this game for nearly a year and will continue to provide updates regularly! (Link is on the right-hand side of the page labelled "View the manual")

Join Our Discord




for Sweet Surrender along with our other games! So feel free to stop by, share your thoughts and feedback to us, and engage with other members of our community! (Link is on the right-hand side of the page.)

About The Developer


We are an indie studio based in Munich, Germany. We focus on transparency, performance, stability, gameplay, and community engagement. Your feedback is valued and helps us continually improve our games, so we encourage you to join our Discord, or contact us on any of our other socials!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R290 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC

short_description: Sweet Surrender is a fast-paced roguelike VR shooter. Fight your way up a dystopian megatower, filled to the brim with tyrant machines hell-bent on destroying the last of humanity. Build your arsenal of weapons, upgrades, and explosives to take down the machine overlords.
